remarks: An element is less than or equal to a meet iff the element is less than or equal to each argument of the meet.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2011.)
statement:
latmle.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latmle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
latmle.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
latlem12 $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .<_ Y /\ X .<_ Z ) <-> X .<_ ( Y ./\ Z ) ) ) $.
